name: Zombie-19
description:
A zombie virus is out of control and you have to protect the civilians from getting infected. Fight against 20 waves of zombies in Zombie-19!

Controls:

A/D: Movement

Space: Jump

Leftclick: Shoot

Assets used:

Clouds: https://latenighcoffe.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-semi-realistic-clouds

Sound effects: https://freesound.org

Music: https://files.freemusicarchive.org/storage-freemusicarchive-org/music/ccCommunit...
